name: Briky: Riot Profiteering Simulation
description:
The riot's here, and you gotta make some moola!

Buy and sell bricks to willing rioters, before using bricks yourself to protect your store.

Watch the game slowly spiral Out of Control as prices fluctuate, guards become more aggressive, time gets shorter and even the laws of physics slowly deteriorate.

Had fun with this one lads!

The music is composed by onemansymphony.bandcamp.com and the sound effects are from Zapslat.com.
